body:
Comment 6 by **f.guerrieri**: 
rsc: yes as soon as I read eeeesti comment I understood my obvious error :) In my
defense I will say that it was late but obviously it's just that I am still learning
my ways with Go :-)
I have seen the thread(s) of course, I naively hoped that *in this particular case*
(that is when using a named return) the compiler were able to spot the error. Thanks
for the explanations!
